EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Event_Telco Luncheon Series_Q314.05 Reminder Invite_1Oct2014
EmailTemplate.subject: Last Chance to Register: Executive luncheon series - Telecommunications
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
With competition heating up in the Australian Telco market, you need to improve and speed up the innovation cycle. This speed will be a determining factor in maximizing your customer experience and thus acquiring and retaining customers.
Register now <http://connect.pivotal.io/APJ-Telco-luncheonseries.html> to join Pivotal's Global Chief Technology Officer for Telecommunications, Paul Davey and our guest speaker - Telecommunications Technologist & Futurist, Shara Evans at one of our exclusive luncheons to discover the new technologies available to maximize your innovation plans.
Shara's keynote will cover the current technologies and trends, and how Telecommunication companies can translate them in to viable business strategies.
Hear what Vodafone <https://www.vodafone.es> has done with their “Big Data, Fast Data” project to benefit both their customers and the communities they serve. Learn more <http://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal/news-2/vodafone-spain-to-demo-at-mobile-world-congress-how-big-fast-data-will-revolutionize-telco-powered-by-pivotal> about Vodofone's breakthrough demo at this year's Mobile World Congress.
Event Details:
Sydney Date: Tuesday 7th October 2014 Time: 12.15 for registration with 12.30pm start – 2.30pm Location: Aria Restaurant, 1 Macquarie St <http://www.ariarestaurant.com/>
Melbourne Date: Wednesday 8th October 2014 Time: 12.15 for registration with 12.30pm start – 2.30pm Location: Bistro Guillaume, Crown Entertainment Complex, Southbank <http://bistroguillaumemelbourne.com.au/>
Register Now >> <http://connect.pivotal.io/APJ-Telco-luncheonseries.html>
We hope you can join us, The Pivotal Team
